def calculate_minimum_days(k, q, queries):
    t = [0] / (k + 1)
    t[1] = 1
    d = [0]
    n = i = 1
    while i < 1001:
        if 2000 * t[k] > i - 1e-07:
            d.append(n)
            i += 1
        else:
            t = [0] + [(j * t[j] + (k - j + 1) * t[j - 1]) / k for j in range(1, k + 1)]
            n += 1
    results = [d[p] for p in queries]
    return results
